location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No.14 from Lewis Pelly, Herat to His Excellency Charles Alison, British Minister at Tehran

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that Sirdar Shir Ahmed Khan, third son of Sultan Ahmed Khan age 14, had died on 17 October of a wound to the mouth incurred a few days prior during action between his father's troops and the Jumsheedee [Jamshidi] tribe.
